description:
The monkey, Gordo, convinces Midge and the others that he has proof of the Earth`s destruction on an old video tape. Desperately wanting to know the truth the bugs follow him on to his ship, but are left stranded when the monkey hatches his dastardly plan. Master Wang decides to put his life on the line in order to help the bugs get the Stork back from the nefarious pirate monkey. Midge hatches his own plan to make Gordo pay for tricking him and his friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Master Wang`s Resolution / Stork Recovery Operation!
Wan-roushi no Ketsui / Stork Dakkan Sakusen!
ワン老師の決意 / ストーク奪還作戦!
